q: `` Hopefully, I'll be with the Eagles next year. We'll see what happens,'' said Michael Vick , who added that he expects`` everything to go according to plan.'' We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said. Maytin contended that the disorderly conduct charge should have been dropped because Fordham was protected by free speech.
